translations: n．总督辖区（复数）：古波斯帝国的行政区划，由总督（satrap）管理。
· The Persian Empire was divided into several satrapies.
波斯帝国被划分为几个总督辖区。

sentences.sentence: The satrapies of Atropatene and Caucasian Albania were established in the 4th century BC and included the approximate territories of present-day Azerbaijan and southern parts of Dagestan.
sentences.translation: Atropatene总督的辖地以及高加索的阿尔巴尼亚在公元前4世纪被建立，包括阿塞拜疆现在大部分的领土以及Dagestan以南的部分。
